timeline.bodyText: I'd suggest changing Fs, MetaPath and NameFilter to The file system, The meta path and The name filter
timeline.author: yanghua
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -381,7 +381,15 @@ public static HoodieTableMetaClient initTableAndGetMetaClient(Configuration hado
     return metaClient;
   }
 
-  // HELPER METHODS TO CREATE META FILE NAMES
+  /**
+   * Helper method to scan all hoodie-instant metafiles.
+   *
+   * @param fs Fs implementation for this table
+   * @param metaPath MetaPath where meta files are stored
+   * @param nameFilter NameFilter to filter meta files

replies.bodyText: @yanghua，Thanks for your suggestion, I'll fix it.
replies.author: wangxianghu

diff --git a/hudi-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hudi/common/table/HoodieTableMetaClient.java b/hudi-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hudi/common/table/HoodieTableMetaClient.java
index 945fa5a31..c1f326a54 100644
--- a/hudi-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hudi/common/table/HoodieTableMetaClient.java
+++ b/hudi-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hudi/common/table/HoodieTableMetaClient.java

@@ -384,9 +384,9 @@ public class HoodieTableMetaClient implements Serializable {
   /**
    * Helper method to scan all hoodie-instant metafiles.
    *
-   * @param fs Fs implementation for this table
-   * @param metaPath MetaPath where meta files are stored
-   * @param nameFilter NameFilter to filter meta files
+   * @param fs The file system implementation for this table
+   * @param metaPath The meta path where meta files are stored
+   * @param nameFilter The name filter to filter meta files
    * @return An array of meta FileStatus
    * @throws IOException In case of failure
    */
